What are the recent updates about 'Singaporean deported from Thailand charged with drug trafficking, faces death penalty'? Can you give me more details?

A Singaporean man, Benny Kee Soon Chuan, has been charged with drug trafficking after being deported from Thailand. He faces the death penalty for his alleged involvement in drug-related activities.
For more details, you can read the full article here: https://www.channelnewsasia.com/singapore/drug-trafficking-singaporean-benny-kee-soon-chuan-thailand-charged-death-penalty-4620236
